articles.description: Cryptocurrency scammers have stolen over $1 billion from 46,000 people since the start of 2021, a new Federal Trade Commission report says.
articles.content:
New York (CNN)Cryptocurrency scammers have stolen over $1 billion from 46,000 people since the start of 2021, a new Federal Trade Commission report says. 
The FTC rang the alarm bells on Friday, say… [+2941 chars]
